title: Riot's explanation on Popstar Ahri 2.0 and "Variant" skins like Pajama Guardians
body:
> The intent is to provide players with a sense of pride and accomplishment for unlocking "different" skins.
> 
> As for cost, we selected initial values based upon data from the PBE and other adjustments made to RP costs before launch. Among other things, we're looking at average per-player RP purchase rates on a daily basis, and we'll be making constant adjustments to ensure that players have challenges that are compelling, rewarding, and of course attainable via spending.
> 
> We appreciate the candid feedback, and the passion the community has put forth around the current topics here on Reddit, our forums and across numerous social media outlets.
> 
> Our team will continue to make changes and monitor community feedback and update everyone as soon and as often as we can.

Discount: ~~30%~~ → 45%
